page.title: 03A Typical Day
page.content:
An average day in the life of a school child in our area. Wake about 7.30 am, wash and dress in school uniform. Have breakfast usually fruit, sometimes cereals. Friend calls about 8.00 am and we set out to walk to the bus-stop, the bus usually arrives at about 8.20 am and takes us straight to the school. Before school begins we go and feed the hens and collect the eggs.
School begins at 9.05 am and is divided up into 45 minute periods - we have 4 periods in the morning and 2 in the afternoon from 2.00 pm until 3.30 pm when we return home by bus to our villages.
Evenings are usually spent in watching the TV about 2-3 hours on average, or listening to records or doing
